item.title: Ana Nora Evans
item.description: Ana Nora (Sovarel) Evans University of Virginia AnaNEvans@virginia.edu Research &nbsp · &nbsp Teaching &nbsp · &nbsp Other Activities &nbsp · &nbsp Personal I am currently enrolled in the Post Graduate Master of Teaching program at the School of Education and Human Development at the University of Virginia, to earn a teaching licence for secondary education in Mathematics and Computer Science. I am looking for a teaching position in secondary education in Mathematics or Computer Science strting with the 2022-2023 school year.

item.title: Second Grade Math
item.description: Elementary School Math Lessons In Spring 2020, I developed and delivered online guest lectures for a group of second graders. Areas. An introduction to the area formulas for rectangle, parallelogram, and triangle. [pptx] [Video] Pythagorean Theorem. An introduction to the proof of the Pythagorean Theorem using cutting and rearranging. [pptx] Peano’s Axioms. [pptx] Proofs with Peano’s Axioms. Proofs of addition properties. [pptx]
